name: Nomad Caravan
description: A traveling group of nomadic traders and families creates a mobile marketplace and information network. The diverse goods and constant movement provide unique trading opportunities, while the mobile nature makes it difficult to locate or control.
atmosphere: Caravan wheels creak along the road while traders call out their wares in exotic languages. The air carries the mingled scents of spices, fabrics, and the promise of distant lands. Every wagon holds treasures from far-off places. Your skin feels the rhythm of constant movement and the sense of endless horizons. The taste of exotic goods and travel fills your mouth.
